author: mturk
msg: Add dynamic management to load balancer:
It enables changing load factors, session routes, redirection

author: mturk
msg: Add pool used for allocating proxy_server_conf to that struct.
It will be used for dynamic configuration, to ensure that dynamic
params has the same lifetime as the config has.

author: stas
msg: s/die/CORE::die/ after exec() to avoid warnings (and therefore
failures) when someone overrides CORE::die when using Apache-Test
